name: NAPR
description:
The game is set in an unknown sci-fi military base. The player wakes up inside this base called the FTA (Facility for Technology Advancement). This character is a cyborg that is stored in hibernation trained to use a portal gun to solve puzzles. This continues for numerous levels, through which there are subtle clues that its mission is not as clear cut as it was told… As the cyborg traverses the various sectors of the military base, it comes to the realization that there is a major problem with the base, causing the NAPR unit to go against the wishes of the commander.

Play as NAPR and defeat the many big bads of the FTA! Can you survive the gantlet?
